title: ARE YOU KIDDING ME RIOT?
body: Your client just glitched out where it put me in champ select during my series and I couldn't select anything at all. It caused me to gain my 2nd loss in the series automatically like seriously wtf. I'm sick of you guys causing me to be getting auto losses cuz of bugs you guys can't fix.

replies.body: It sounds like your connection lost sync during champion select which left you behind, and it sucks that happened during your series.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is tuned-up and won't cause further discussions.  We're also still in the pre-season, so take heart there's lots of time!
